TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:

Hello Mike,

Do whatever you want. I might not be able to finish the model bcs of RL issues.

And what is Space shuttle ultra ?

> 
> I hope you guys have the same experience too; that building Stations with an ARM is difficult and fun at the same time:
> [http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/633104240488030923/5341A3BAD9D6E83902F0FF5FCC59CBEF7519C3C2/](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/633104240488030923/5341A3BAD9D6E83902F0FF5FCC59CBEF7519C3C2/)

Well, I haven't tried using an arm in the current KSP (was probably back before beta!), but everytime I tried, it was wiggle wiggle WAGGLE BOOM! Has that been solved with any of the arms?

And now for a question for everyone here: Is the shuttle 1.0.4 compatible? I'm asking because there could be a stray download link to the latest version in the thread somewhere, and I'm not quite up to thread hunting atm. Also, if it isn't, how would a steam KSP user get 1.0.2? Thankies.

> 
> Well, I haven't tried using an arm in the current KSP (was probably back before beta!), but everytime I tried, it was wiggle wiggle WAGGLE BOOM! Has that been solved with any of the arms?
> And now for a question for everyone here: Is the shuttle 1.0.4 compatible? I'm asking because there could be a stray download link to the latest version in the thread somewhere, and I'm not quite up to thread hunting atm. Also, if it isn't, how would a steam KSP user get 1.0.2? Thankies.

Has anyone got a working RO config for Dreamchaser or any of the other extras?

Edit: It seems this version of the shuttle itself doesnt work in RO either. The orbiter is too small, all the other parts that go with it are the right size I think though

Well... the the hinges on the arm are moving very slowly (at 0.1 speed and 0.05 acceleration) and thus reduce chance of wobbling.

Its a shame jeast left us, it would be nice to have help... I cant keep things organized being this busy myself
Ok with the arm I will make it so it docks or sticks to the ship, no extra plugins or parts. And get that .craft uploaded.
I am sure there would be a plethera of volunteers if you ask for help with things, just specify what you need and someone will step up garunteed

> Its a shame jeast left us, it would be nice to have help... I cant keep things organized being this busy myself

Do not hurry, add-on you will not go anywhere, and the community will wait patiently.
Had an idea for another thing to this...a working MMU!

> 
> Had an idea for another thing to this...a working MMU!

Just built one for KIS: KIS adds wearable props to your Kerbal... so model a mmu-alike, give it some evafuel storage and an inventory and you have a (working) MMU.

Mike, we understand the hardships of taking on so many projects and requests, and a modder like you who never backs down when influxes of projects and progress come your way is truly a great example, despite being the lone worker ever since Jeast left. You're truly amazing.

Take a break from development if you want, We'll all be here to support you, and wait patiently.
